quotes.text: Our strength grows out of our weaknesses.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: More often than not, anger is actually an indication of weakness rather than of strength.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal: my strength lies solely in my tenacity.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.text: When I dare to be powerful, to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.text: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Nothing has more strength than dire necessity.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: We must overcome the notion that we must be regular. It robs you of the chance to be extraordinary and leads you to the mediocre.
quotes.author: Uta Hagen
